Submodules¶

amazons.algorithms.minimax.minimax_algorithm module¶

class amazons.algorithms.minimax.minimax_algorithm.MinimaxAlgorithm(max_depth, max_time)¶

Bases: Algorithm, ABC

Abstract class for the Minimax algorithm

Attributes:

_max_depth: max depth of the search tree _max_time: max time for exploring the tree

Author: Gonzalo Rodríguez Rodríguez

abstract make_move(board, player)¶

Method to get the move chosen by the algorithm in a given position for a given player :param board: position of the game :param player: player to move :return: move chosen by the algorithm

amazons.algorithms.minimax.minimax_algorithm.all_squares_marked(new_squares, reached_squares)¶

Function to check if all reachable squares have been reached :param new_squares: new squares reached :param reached_squares: already reached squares :return: True if all reached, False otherwise

amazons.algorithms.minimax.minimax_algorithm.calculate_distance(board, start, end)¶

Function to calculate the minimal number of queen moves between 2 squares :param board: board to use in the calculations :param start: start square :param end: end square :return: distance, inf if not reachable

amazons.algorithms.minimax.minimax_algorithm.calculate_full_distance(board, square, player)¶

Function to calculate minimal number of moves to reach a square for a player :param board: board to calculate distance :param square: square to reach :param player: player to calculate distance :return: distance, inf if not reachable

amazons.algorithms.minimax.minimax_algorithm.calculate_king_moves(board)¶

Function to calculate a board where each free square contains a number that indicates the number of surrounding free squares :param board: board as base to calculate the new board :return: the new board

amazons.algorithms.minimax.minimax_algorithm.calculate_mobility(king_moves_board, board, opponent_board, amazon)¶

Calculate individual mobility of the amazons of a player :param king_moves_board: board with the number of free squares around each square :param board: base board :param opponent_board: queen-moves board of the opponent :param amazon: amazon to calculate its mobility :return: alpha (floating point number that determines how trapped an amazon is)

amazons.algorithms.minimax.minimax_algorithm.calculate_queen_boards(board)¶

Function to calculate the board with the number of moves to reach each square for a player :param board: board as base to calculate new board :return: tuple with one board with the number of moves to reach each square for white and another one for black

amazons.algorithms.minimax.minimax_algorithm.calculate_w_factor(board, queen_board_white, queen_board_black)¶

Function to calculate the w factor which indicates the phase of the game :param board: base board :param queen_board_white: board with the queen moves for white :param queen_board_black: board with the queen moves for white :return: queen board

amazons.algorithms.minimax.minimax_algorithm.difference_relative_territory(d1, d2, player)¶

Function to compare the distance between number of moves to reach a square by white (D1) and black (D2) for the relative territory evaluation :param d1: number of moves to reach a square by white :param d2: number of moves to reach a square by black :param player: player with the turn :return: difference calculation

amazons.algorithms.minimax.minimax_algorithm.difference_relative_territory_10(white_moves, black_moves, player)¶

Deprecated function to compare the distance between number of moves to reach a square by white (D1) and black (D2) for the relative territory evaluation :param white_moves: number of moves to reach a square by white :param black_moves: number of moves to reach a square by black :param player: player with the turn :return: difference calculation

amazons.algorithms.minimax.minimax_algorithm.difference_territory(d1, d2, player)¶

Function to compare the distance between number of moves to reach a square by white (D1) and black (D2) for the territory evaluation :param d1: number of moves to reach a square by white :param d2: number of moves to reach a square by black :param player: player with the turn :return: difference calculation

amazons.algorithms.minimax.minimax_algorithm.evaluate_individual_mobility(board, queen_board_white, queen_board_black)¶

Function to evaluate mobility :param board: board to evaluate :param queen_board_white: board with number of moves to reach each square for white :param queen_board_black: board with number of moves to reach each square for black :return: evaluation

amazons.algorithms.minimax.minimax_algorithm.evaluate_mobility(board)¶

Function to evaluate mobility of the board :param board: board to calculate its mobility evaluation :return: evaluation of mobility :raise TypeError: if argument is not a board

amazons.algorithms.minimax.minimax_algorithm.evaluate_relative_territory_prev(board, player)¶

Deprecated function to evaluate relative territory :param board: board to evaluate :param player: player with the turn :return: evaluation

amazons.algorithms.minimax.minimax_algorithm.evaluate_territory(board, difference, player, queen_board_white=None, queen_board_black=None)¶

Function to evaluate territory :param board: board to evaluate :param difference: function that calculates the difference in number of moves from white and black :param player: player with the turn :param queen_board_white: board with number of moves to reach each square for white :param queen_board_black: board with number of moves to reach each square for black :return: evaluation

amazons.algorithms.minimax.minimax_algorithm.f(w, alpha)¶
amazons.algorithms.minimax.minimax_algorithm.get_free_squares_around(board, square)¶

Function that calculates the number of free squares around a given square :param board: board as base :param square: base square :return: number of free squares around the square

amazons.algorithms.minimax.minimax_algorithm.sort_moves(moves, ratings)¶

Function to sort moves by rating :param moves: moves to sort :param ratings: ratings of the moves :return: sorted moves

amazons.algorithms.minimax.minimax_algorithm.weight(depth)¶

Calculate weight for the history table :param depth: depth given for the calculation :return: weight :raise TypeError: if the depth is not int :raise ValueError: if depth is not greater than or equal to 0

class amazons.algorithms.minimax.minimax_algorithm_multi_process.MinimaxAlgorithmMultiProcess(max_depth, max_time, n_workers)¶

Bases: MinimaxAlgorithm

Class for the Minimax algorithm multiprocess with mobility evaluation and

Attributes:

_max_depth: max depth of the search tree _max_time: max time for exploring the tree n_workers: number of worker processes

Author: Gonzalo Rodríguez Rodríguez

get_best_move(board, player)¶

Method to get the best move, dividing load for a number of workers :param board: board state :param player: integer representing plyer :return: the best move

make_move(board, player)¶

Method to get the move chosen by the algorithm in a given position for a given player :param board: position of the game :param player: player to move :return: move chosen by the algorithm

worker_load(board, player, moves, scores, pid)¶

Method to contain the worker load :param board: board state :param player: integer representing player :param moves: moves for the worker :param scores: scores of the moves :param pid: process id for the worker :return:
